Internationalized Domain Name Software Development Kit API Specification Version 1.0

Packages
com.vgrs.xcode.common Classes providing data manipulation which is not specific to the IDNA rfc.
com.vgrs.xcode.ext Classes which leverage components from the common and idna packages to accomplish a specific task.
com.vgrs.xcode.idna Classes implementing the solutions proposed in the IDNA rfc.
com.vgrs.xcode.jnlp Classes implementing a Graphical User Interface for IDNA conversions.
com.vgrs.xcode.util Contains classes to access data source files, randomly generate test data, log debug info for unit test, and provides an exception class.
